data.title: VoIP Home Phone Service in Auburn Hills, MI
data.meta_description: If you live in the Auburn Hills area and want the best landline phone alternative, Ooma offers free home phone service over the internet.
data.meta_site_name: Ooma.com - Smart solutions for home and business.
data.text:
Welcome to Auburn Hills, Michigan! If you're in the market for home phone service in our area, you've come to the right place. Auburn Hills is a vibrant and exciting city nestled in the heart of Michigan, and it stands out from the rest in more ways than one.

One prominent industry that calls Auburn Hills home is the automotive industry, with many major automobile manufacturers and suppliers having their headquarters or facilities here. This has led to significant growth and development in the area and offers plenty of job opportunities for residents.

For those who are interested in history and culture, Auburn Hills is also home to the Walter P. Chrysler Museum, which showcases the rich history of the Chrysler brand and the automotive industry as a whole. This museum is a must-see for any car enthusiast or those looking to learn more about the city's historical significance.

Throughout the year, Auburn Hills also hosts various special events that bring the community together. From concerts and festivals to sporting events and art shows, there's always something exciting happening in Auburn Hills.

Now, let's talk about Ooma, the perfect home phone service for Auburn Hills residents. Ooma offers a basic service that is completely free, with users only paying monthly taxes and fees. Plus, you can make free calls not just in Auburn Hills, but throughout Michigan and the entire United States. For those who have loved ones abroad, Ooma also offers low international calling rates.

One of the key features of Ooma is that you can take advantage of its phone features even when you're away from home with the Ooma Home Phone app. This means you can stay connected with friends and family no matter where you are.

So why wait? Contact Ooma today for more information on how you can sign up for their affordable and feature-packed home phone service in Auburn Hills. Don't miss out on the chance to enjoy crystal-clear calls and reliable service in our amazing city.
